entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 12:41 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.2°C
Wind: W 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
